show.subtitle: Dr. Len and Nurse Vicki discuss various natural and holistic health topics while taking your calls.
show.title: Prescriptions For Health

title: Prescriptions For Health
content:
How healthcare died and became a business Are SSRI antidepressants safe after surgery? Can naturopaths reduce cardiovascular risk factors in patients seeing cardiologists?
Do drug companies give kickbacks to doctors and pharmacists for prescribing their drugs?
Can just one session of the relaxation response change DNA expression?
Vicki’s 20-20 tips: Why is vitamin “F” important How toxic is your lipstick
